name: Raijin
description:
This is a action adventure game where you have to deal with enemies with all those powers you have to stop the boss from rewinding the whole world to the past to rule the world

CONTROLS : 

WASD to move
Q - to heal yourself
E - to use push force to push enemie

press shift and use directional keys to dodge 

left click - to attack enemies

play the game and have fun
